p: Although high overall, self-reported ART adherence among HIV-positive Hispanic/Latino MSM was lower among younger persons, those living at or below poverty, and those who reported drug use, depression, and unmet needs for ancillary services. The most commonly reported reason for last missed ART dose was forgetting to take it; three in five persons reported multiple reasons. These results indicate possible avenues for interventions to help Hispanic/Latino MSM engage in care and remain ART-adherent.
